doc:
Valli Valli https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valli_Valli 0 Valli is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera that airs on Sun TV. It stars Vidhya Mohan, Raj Kumar Manoharan, Anuradha Krishnamurthy, Ajay Kapoor, Latha, Poovilangu Mohan, Kanya Bharathi, Lakshmi Raj, Girish, Ranini and Dr. Sharmila. This show premeried on 17 December 2012 and completed its 1700th episode on 3 November 2018. ￼￼This is the second longest running serial of Sun TV.The show is produced by Saregama and directed by K.J.Thangapandian. Valli is an_Indian_Tamil-language_soap_opera that airs on Sun_TV . It stars Vidhya_Mohan , Raj_Kumar_Manoharan , Anuradha_Krishnamurthy , Ajay_Kapoor , Latha , Poovilangu_Mohan , Kanya_Bharathi , Lakshmi_Raj , Girish , Ranini and Dr._Sharmila . This_show premeried on 17_December_2012 and completed its_1700th_episode on 3_November_2018 . This is the_second_longest_running_serial of Sun_TV.The_show is_produced by Saregama and directed by K.J.Thangapandian .
